Condition_summary_1: Sediment and erosion control measures must be in place and maintained to avoid sediment release.
Condition_summary_2: Qualified environmental professional on-site to monitor instream and shoreline activities.
Condition_summary_3: Fish rescue and relocation in isolated areas before work commences.
Condition_summary_4: Temporary rock causeways must be installed no sooner than July 1 and removed by September 30 annually.
Offset_footprint_size: 50 m2 boulder clusters, 100 m2 sweeper trees
Vegetation_Cover: Riparian vegetation (e.g. trees and shrubs and grass)
Boulder: Boulder clusters for velocity refuge habitat
Instream_structures: Overwintering pool habitat with minimum 1.7m depth
